# Class Device

Represents a computation device that can be used for processing.

##### Index

### Methods

getIndex getInfo getType

## Methods

### getIndex

  * getIndex(): any

Returns the index of this device.

#### Returns any

The device index




### getInfo

  * getInfo(): { freeMemoryBytes: any; name: any; totalMemoryBytes: any }

Returns information about this device.

#### Returns { freeMemoryBytes: any; name: any; totalMemoryBytes: any }

Information about the device




### getType

  * getType(): [DeviceType](/enums/core_device.DeviceType)

Returns the type of this device.

#### Returns [DeviceType](/enums/core_device.DeviceType)

The device type enum value

#### Throws

InworldError if the device type is invalid
